message: Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest way to start.
Meet in the middle of our previous offers
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me.  Let's get closer to a deal.
Getting closer, but I still need a bit more
We're running out of time!  I'm willing to take a bigger risk, but this is my final offer.  Let's make a deal.
